PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-04592011-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  HRSDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS is to update these thresholds based on the Consumer Price Index in order to account for inflation.
